title: Playable Entity Info Schema
description: Defines the structure for playable entity information.

real-name.description: The real name of the playable entity.

description.description: A brief description of the playable entity.

attributes.description: Defines the core attributes of the playable entity.

life.description: The health points of the entity.

dmg.description: The damage points the entity can inflict.

defense.description: The defense level of the entity.

speed.description: The movement speed of the entity.

dodge-reload.description: The time taken to reload a dodge.

metadata.description: Additional metadata for the playable entity.

tile-size.description: The size of the tile representing the entity.
